name: Pironeducation
tag_list: acca, ifrs, cima, cpa, cfa, training, course, accounting, standards, acca-course, financial-reporting, india, us, middle-east, africa, south-east-asia, ifrs-training
overview:
PIRON Education is a division of PIRON, a leading business group. PIRON Education is a leading provider of online professional educational and training services. Established with an objective to introduce educational courses which help students achieve their career goals, PIRON Education aims at bridging the gap between students and success.

We prepare students for professional accountancy and financial exams including the ACCA, Global MBA, CIMA, CPA, CFA, IFRS and alike.

PIRON Education has a rich client list developed over many years and includes top Global companies through to SMEâ€™s.s
